_meta.source: Researched from Fukuoka tourism and cruise port guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Hakata, Tenjin, Dazaifu shrine area

transit_routes.name: Subway to Tenjin
transit_routes.note: Most convenient way to reach city center from port area.

transit_routes.name: Train to Dazaifu
transit_routes.note: Transfer at Tenjin for Nishitetsu Line to shrine.

transit_routes.name: Taxi from Port
transit_routes.note: Direct to main attractions. Meters are reliable.

featured_experiences.name: Hakata Ramen & Yatai
featured_experiences.note: Famous for rich pork broth ramen. Evening yatai stalls are iconic.

featured_experiences.name: Dazaifu Tenmangu
featured_experiences.note: One of Japan's most important Shinto shrines, dedicated to learning.

featured_experiences.name: Shofukuji Temple
featured_experiences.note: Where Zen Buddhism was first established in Japan.
